org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.problems

Class CompilerProblemCategorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.problems.CompilerProblemCategorizer

  • public class CompilerProblemCategorizer
extends Object
    Class used to determine if an ICompilerProblem should be reported as an error or a warning. A user can override the default severity of a problem by using the following compiler options: -error-problems -warning-problems -ignore-problems

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompilerProblemCategorizer()
      Default constructor.
      CompilerProblemCategorizer(ICompilerProblemSettings problemSettings)
      This categorizer can look at user configured overrides of problem severity, falling back to the default severity.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompilerProblemClassification getProblemClassification(ICompilerProblem problem) 
      CompilerProblemSeverity getProblemSeverity(ICompilerProblem problem)
      Get the severity of the compiler problem.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompilerProblemCategorizer

        public CompilerProblemCategorizer()
        Default constructor. This categorizer can only consider the default severity of problems.

      • CompilerProblemCategorizer

        public CompilerProblemCategorizer(ICompilerProblemSettings problemSettings)
        This categorizer can look at user configured overrides of problem severity, falling back to the default severity.
        Parameters:
        problemSettings - configuration settings that effect how problems are categorized. If null, only the default severity of problems will be used.

    • Method Detail

      • getProblemSeverity

        public CompilerProblemSeverity getProblemSeverity(ICompilerProblem problem)
        Get the severity of the compiler problem. Check if the user overrode any of the problem severities. If not, return that severity. Otherwise return the default severity.
        Parameters:
        problem - the compiler problem. May not be null.
        Returns:
        the severity of the problem.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if problem is null.

      • getProblemClassification

        public CompilerProblemClassification getProblemClassification(ICompilerProblem problem)
